dc:title: Valiant Is The Word
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Admires the heroic sacrifice and hard work of Iola Ellis in helping her sister's daughters get an education. Advocates educational rights for Negroes so they can become leaders.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 332 1938-03-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
